   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File    : happy_21_SUITE.erl
   23: %%% Description : Happy test of all common_test callback functions.
   24: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: -module(happy_21_SUITE).
   26: 
   27: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   28: -compile(export_all).
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: 
   32: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   33: %% COMMON TEST CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: 
   36: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   38: %%
   39: %% Info = [tuple()]
   40: %%   List of key/value pairs.
   41: %%
   42: %% Description: Returns list of tuples to set default properties
   43: %%              for the suite.
   44: %%
   45: %% Note: The suite/0 function is only meant to be used to return
   46: %% default data values, not perform any other operations.
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: suite() ->
   49:     [
   50:      {timetrap,{seconds,10}},
   51:      {require, v1},
   52:      {userdata, {info,"Happy test of CT callback functions."}}
   53:     ].
   54: 
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   57: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   58: %%
   59: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   60: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   61: %% Reason = term()
   62: %%   The reason for skipping the suite.
   63: %%
   64: %% Description: Initialization before the suite.
   65: %%
   66: %% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
   67: %% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   70:     [{ips,ips_data} | Config].
   71: 
   72: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   73: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   74: %%
   75: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   76: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   77: %%
   78: %% Description: Cleanup after the suite.
   79: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   80: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   81:     ips_data = ?config(ips, Config).
   82: 
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   85: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   86: %%
   87: %% TestCase = atom()
   88: %%   Name of the test case that is about to run.
   89: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   90: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   91: %% Reason = term()
   92: %%   The reason for skipping the test case.
   93: %%
   94: %% Description: Initialization before each test case.
   95: %%
   96: %% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
   97: %% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
   98: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   99: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  100:     [{TestCase,{TestCase,data}} | Config].
  101: 
  102: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  103: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  104: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
  105: %%
  106: %% TestCase = atom()
  107: %%   Name of the test case that is finished.
  108: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  109: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
  110: %%
  111: %% Description: Cleanup after each test case.
  112: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  114:     {TestCase,data} = ?config(TestCase, Config).
  115: 
  116: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  117: %% Function: sequences() -> Sequences
  118: %%
  119: %% Sequences = [{SeqName,TestCases}]
  120: %% SeqName = atom()
  121: %%   Name of a sequence.
  122: %% TestCases = [atom()]
  123: %%   List of test cases that are part of the sequence
  124: %%
  125: %% Description: Specifies test case sequences.
  126: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  127: sequences() -> 
  128:     [{seq1,[seq1_tc1, seq1_tc2]},
  129:      {seq2,[seq2_tc1, seq2_tc2]}].
  130: 
  131: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  132: %% Function: all() -> TestCases | {skip,Reason}
  133: %%
  134: %% TestCases = [TestCase | {sequence,SeqName}]
  135: %% TestCase = atom()
  136: %%   Name of a test case.
  137: %% SeqName = atom()
  138: %%   Name of a test case sequence.
  139: %% Reason = term()
  140: %%   The reason for skipping all test cases.
  141: %%
  142: %% Description: Returns the list of test cases that are to be executed.
  143: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  144: all() -> 
  145:     [tc1,
  146:      tc2,
  147:      seq1,
  148:      tc3,
  149:      seq2,
  150:      tc4].
  151: 
  152: 
  153: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  154: %% TEST CASES
  155: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  156: 
  157: tc1() -> 
  158:     [{userdata,{info, "This is a testcase"}}].
  159: 
  160: tc1(Config) -> 
  161:     ips_data = ?config(ips, Config),
  162:     {tc1,data} = ?config(tc1, Config),
  163:     apple = ct:get_config(v1),
  164:     ok.
  165: 
  166: tc2() ->
  167:     [{timetrap,5000},
  168:      {require,v2}].
  169: 
  170: tc2(Config) ->
  171:     ips_data = ?config(ips, Config),
  172:     undefined = ?config(tc1, Config),
  173:     {tc2,data} = ?config(tc2, Config),
  174:     plum = ct:get_config(v2),
  175:     ok.
  176: 
  177: tc3() ->
  178:     [{timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
  179: 
  180: tc3(_Config) ->
  181:     ok = ct:require(v3),
  182:     [{v31, cherry},{v32, banana},{v33, coconut}] = ct:get_config(v3),
  183:     banana = ct:get_config({v3,v32}),
  184:     ok.
  185:     
  186: tc4(Config) ->
  187:     {skip,"Skipping this one"}.
  188:     
  189: seq1_tc1(_) ->
  190:     ok.
  191: seq1_tc2(_) ->
  192:     ok.
  193: 
  194: seq2_tc1(_) ->
  195:     ok.
  196: seq2_tc2(_) ->
  197:     ok.
